title: Artificial respiration by the H N Method
creator_credit: Svend Aage Lorentz and Danish Red Cross
brief_description: This film demonstrates the method of artificial respiration developed by Holger Nielson. The two basic movements of each cycle are the back pressure and arm lift. Application for adults is demonstrated and the modifications necessary for use on children are also shown.
